alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 2:33PM AKST until December 30 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Visibility one half mile at times. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
